attributes.action: increase tax payable on income from rented property, unless the property is managed by a local authority, ALMO, or housing association.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Houses are for living in. Prices are still inflated pricing people out of the market. Too many people are getting rich off tenants. Many people who can't get a mortgage pay more in inflated rents than they would if they could by. This needs to be discouraged.
